original_title: Child running in support of his brother during marathon dies
original_body_lines: A 10-year-old child who was running in support of his brother during a marathon in the Palagala area in Kudahettawa, died after collapsing on the road.

Police said the child, a resident of Palagala was admitted to the Kalawewa Hospital after he had collapsed on the road while running alongside his brother, who was participating in the marathon during a Sinhala and Tamil New Year festival event in the area.
The child died after being transferred to the Anuradhapura General Hospital for further treatment.
